See the 2016 BigCommerce Design Award winners, check out our new apps, and and share your ideas with us
AUGUST 2016 UPDATES See the 2016 BigCommerce Design Award winners
We’re proud to introduce the winners of the inaugural BigCommerce Design Awards, five stores that represent excellence in ecommerce design. Marucci Sports was the overall winner, while Nine Line Apparel, Sisu Guard, Di Bruno Brothers and Sierra Designs won their categories. See all the winning stores <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/best-ecommerce-website-design/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Customer+Newsletter&utm_campaign=September&utm_term=&utm_content=Design+AwardsWooh]]>, plus an additional 57 honorable mentions.
Read more <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/best-ecommerce-website-design/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Customer+Newsletter&utm_campaign=September&utm_term=&utm_content=Design+Awards]]>
Connect to QuickBooks Online or Xero with free apps
We’ve recently improved QuickBooks Online and Xero: they’re now faster and easier to configure, with quicker load times, fewer steps and support for mapping existing tax rates during setup. Both companies are currently offering sign-up specials to BigCommerce customers.
Sign up for QuickBooks Online » <[[http://www.quickbookspartners.com/?sc=PAR-BIGCOMMERCE&cid=par_bigcommerce_hp_offer&dis=Zjb3rH]]>
Sign up for Xero » <[[https://www.xero.com/us/bigcommerce/]]> Share your voice on BigCommerce Ideas
As a BigCommerce customer, BigCommerce Ideas is your place to be heard. Suggest and vote on new product features, share ideas on improving our support offerings, interact directly with BigCommerce staff and more. All you need to participate is a free BigCommerce Community account.
Get Involved » <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/ideas?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Customer+Newsletter&utm_campaign=September&utm_term=&utm_content=BigCommerce+Ideas]]>
Improve search rankings with our powerful SEO
BigCommerce offers the best search engine optimization in the industry. Our sites are built with search engines in mind to drive more free traffic to your store. We automatically optimize your product page URLs and titles, plus give you full access to customize important search data.
Learn how to make the most of our leading SEO tools » <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/SEO-Overview?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Customer+Newsletter&utm_campaign=September&utm_term=&utm_content=SEO+Overview]]>
Our Guide to Shipping Profitability
Putting an effective ecommerce shipping strategy in place is one of the most impactful steps you can take to grow your business online. While many brands start out by taking a simplistic approach to shipping, the most successful merchants use shipping options to differentiate themselves and increase margins. Start shipping smarter » <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/ecommerce-shipping?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Customer+Newsletter&utm_campaign=September&utm_term=&utm_content=Ecommerce+Shipping]]>
